definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: name of a plant, with thick, slimy juice, purslain, Job 6:6 RVm, so Thes Rob Ges al.; SyrVer h.lamto0, anchusa PS:i, 1284; on this, and later interpr. v. Bö Di Löw:pp. 165, 361; only [[אִם־יֶשׁ־טַעַם בְּרִיר חַלָּמוּת]] Job 6:6 is there any taste in the juice of ´[[ח]] (fig. of insipid and dull discourse); > AV RV Ew Hi SS after Targum Saad Rabb. in the white of an egg.
